subject: New review (5★) of Simsonn Pro X Ultra Sim Racing Pedal with Haptic Reactor (from Anichitei C.)
description_text: Rating: 5 | Review Text: Absolutely amazing! The support staff was great and explained the delay in shipping which was in my advantage because they waited first to be in EU then sent it to me, thus didn't need to pay import. The pedals themselfs are awesome, need a little bit of setup like turning the loadcell "screw" a bit but they are awesome!
